titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in Christ's-Church, Dublin, on the 23d. of October, 1698 being the anniversary thanksgiving for putting an end to the Irish Rebellion, which broke out on that day, 1641, before the House of Lords / by Nathanael Lord Bishop of Waterford and Lismore.
titleStmt.author: Foy, Nathaniel, d. 1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook ... for Samuel Adey,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages stained with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
